xwikidoc.name: ExportPageSuggest
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.content: #set($input = $request.get("input").toLowerCase()) #set($sql = "where lower(doc.fullName) like '%${input}%' order by doc.date desc") #set($queryResult = $xwiki.searchDocuments($sql, 30, 0)) #set($results = $queryResult.toArray()) <results type="8"> #foreach($res in $results) <rs id="$velocityCount" info="">$res</rs> #end </results>
